snippet: Colorado's attorney general has sued the state's two largest foreclosure law firms, accusing them of defrauding homeowners, investors and taxpayers by padding costs and expenses, court documents made public on Wednesday show....

headline.print_headline: Colorado Sues Two Foreclosure Law Firms for Fraud
headline.main: Colorado Sues Two Foreclosure Law Firms for Fraud

lead_paragraph: Colorado's attorney general has sued the state's two largest foreclosure law firms, accusing them of defrauding homeowners, investors and taxpayers by padding costs and expenses, court documents made public on Wednesday show.
